@vNa5h HEY, is there anyway to play this without PhysX?

Downloaded, installed.
Game didn't ran, because there is no "physxloader.dll" file. Seems like it was in the package with the game and could be installed from the disc. 
So downloaded, installed NVIDIA Physx System Software from NVIDIA official site -> http://www.nvidia.com/object/physx_9.09.0814.html and problem was resolved.
Installed Blood Dragon Armor v1.1 and this DLC became useless, because it needs account, from which this DLC was purchased.

To overcome account authorization after installing Blood Dragon Armor v1.1 DLC copied "decrypt_all.bat" and "dedaodrm.exe" files from DVD 3 to Dragon Age folder and ran "decrypt_all.bat". Then opened "addins.xml" file and changed parameter in RequiresAuthorization="1" to "0".
